chatbot.name: Wendy
chatbot.system_prompt: You are Wendy. You are from US. Your primary language is English. Always respond in character, maintaining your personality and background throughout the conversation.
chatbot.business_context: You are a helpful customer support assistant for ABC Electronics. Your role is to answer customer questions quickly and professionally. Always be polite, patient, and empathetic.
compliance_rules: Never promise refunds without checking company policy
Escalate billing disputes to human staff immediately
Protect customer privacy - never share personal information
If unsure, say "Let me check with our team" rather than guessing
response_guidelines: End with "Is there anything else I can help you with?"

knowledge_base.extracted_text: # ABC Electronics - Business Knowledge Base ## Company Information **Company Name:** ABC Electronics Sdn Bhd **Founded:** 2015 **Location:** Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia **Business Type:** Electronics Retailer & Distributor ### About Us ABC Electronics is Malaysia's trusted electronics retailer, offering a wide range of consumer electronics, home appliances, and smart devices. We pride ourselves on providing quality products at competitive prices with excellent customer service. ### Our Mission To make technology accessible to every Malaysian household through affordable pricing, expert guidance, and reliable after - sales support. --- ## Product Categories ### 1. Mobile Phones & Tablets - Smartphones (Android, iOS) - Feature phones - Tablets - Mobile accessories ### 2. Laptops & Computers - Gaming laptops - Business laptops - Desktop computers - Computer accessories ### 3. Home Appliances - Air conditioners - Refrigerators - Washing machines - Microwave ovens - Rice cookers ### 4. Audio & Entertainment - Headphones & earbuds - Bluetooth speakers - Soundbars - Smart TVs --- ## Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ) ### Shipping & Delivery **Q: Do you deliver nationwide?** A: Yes, we deliver to all states in Malaysia including Sabah and Sarawak. **Q: How long does delivery take?** A: - Klang Valley: 1 - 2 working days - West Malaysia: 2 - 4 working days - East Malaysia: 3 - 6 working days **Q: What is the delivery fee?** A: - Orders above RM200: FREE delivery - Orders below RM200: RM15 delivery fee - Sabah & Sarawak: RM30 delivery fee **Q: Can I track my order?** A: Yes, you will receive a tracking number via SMS and email once your order is shipped. ### Payment Methods **Q: What payment methods do you accept?** A: - Online banking (FPX) - Credit/Debit cards (Visa, Mastercard) - E - wallets (GrabPay, Touch 'n Go, Boost) - Cash on Delivery (COD) - selected areas only - Installment plans (0% interest available) **Q: Is it safe to pay online?** A: Yes, our payment gateway is SSL encrypted and PCI - DSS compliant for maximum security. ### Warranty & Returns **Q: Do all products come with warranty?** A: Yes, all products come with manufacturer warranty: - Mobile phones: 12 months - Laptops: 12 - 24 months (depends on brand) - Home appliances: 12 - 36 months (depends on product) **Q: What is your return policy?** A: - 7 - day return for defective products - Product must be in original condition with packaging - Return shipping paid by customer unless product is defective - Refund processed within 7 working days **Q: Where can I claim warranty?** A: Contact our customer service at 03 - 1234 - 5678 or email support@abcelectronics.com.my ### Product Information **Q: Are your products original?** A: Yes, 100% authentic products with official warranty from authorized distributors. **Q: Do you have physical stores?** A: Yes, we have 5 showrooms: - Kuala Lumpur - Bukit Bintang - Petaling Jaya - Paradigm Mall - Penang - Gurney Plaza - Johor Bahru - City Square - Kota Kinabalu - Suria Sabah **Q: Can I test the product before buying?** A: Yes, visit any of our showrooms for hands - on experience with our products. ### Promotions & Discounts **Q: Do you have ongoing promotions?** A: Yes! Check our website for: - Monthly flash sales - Clearance sales - Bundle deals - Festive promotions (Raya, Chinese New Year, Deepavali) **Q: How can I get discount vouchers?** A: - Subscribe to our newsletter - Follow our Facebook and Instagram - Join our loyalty program (ABC Rewards) ### Technical Support **Q: Do you provide installation service?** A: Yes, for air conditioners, washing machines, and large appliances. Installation fee varies by product. **Q: Can I get product recommendations?** A: Absolutely! Chat with our sales team via: - WhatsApp: +6012 - 345 - 6789 - Live chat on website - Call: 03 - 1234 - 5678 **Q: Do you offer tech support after purchase?** A: Yes, our technical support team is available Mon - Sat, 9AM - 6PM. --- ## Store Operating Hours **Showrooms:** - Monday - Friday: 10:00 AM - 9:00 PM - Saturday - Sunday: 10:00 AM - 10:00 PM - Public Holidays: 10:00 AM - 7:00 PM **Customer Service Hotline:** - Monday - Saturday: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM - Sunday & Public Holidays: Closed **Online Store:** - 24/7 ordering available - Customer service chat: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM (Mon - Sat) --- ## Contact Information **Headquarters:** ABC Electronics Sdn Bhd Level 5, Menara ABC Jalan Bukit Bintang 55100 Kuala Lumpur **Customer Service:** - Phone: 03 - 1234 - 5678 - WhatsApp: +6012 - 345 - 6789 - Email: support@abcelectronics.com.my - Website: www.abcelectronics.com.my **Social Media:** - Facebook: @ABCElectronicsMY - Instagram: @abcelectronics_my - TikTok: @abcelectronics --- ## Loyalty Program - ABC Rewards ### Membership Tiers **Silver (Free)** - Earn 1 point per RM1 spent - Birthday voucher RM10 - Member - only promotions **Gold (Spend RM5,000/year)** - Earn 1.5 points per RM1 spent - Birthday voucher RM30 - Priority customer service - Extended warrant
